H0.text: In which country were motorized ambulances first used. Germany

H1.text: In which country were motorized ambulances first used. United States

H2.text: In which country were motorized ambulances first used. United Kingdom

H3.text: In which country were motorized ambulances first used. FRANCE

A4.text: Ambulances were first used for emergency transport in 1487 by the Spanish.

A5.text: During the American Civil War vehicles for conveying the wounded off the field of battle were called ambulance wagons.
